how-it-works.title: Do this at the start of every month.

step-1.title: Enter your monthly income
step-1.description: Add your total income for the month, including salary or any other sources.

step-2.title: Add your essential expenses
step-2.description: Record your necessary expenses like rent, bills, and groceries.

step-3.title: Add your wants
step-3.description: Enter non-essential expenses such as entertainment, shopping, and subscriptions.

step-4.title: Set the savings aside
step-4.description: Set aside some of your income for savings or investments.

step-5.title: Start budgeting and tracking
step-5.description: Let us help you manage your money and track your progress with a personalized dashboard.

step-1.title: Enter your monthly income
step-1.description: Add your total income for the month, including salary or any other sources.

step-2.title: Add your expenses
step-2.description: Record all your expenses, essential or non-essential, in the 'expenses' section.

step-3.title: Add non-essential expenses
step-3.description: List any additional discretionary spending like outings, clothes, or subscriptions.

step-4.title: Start budgeting and tracking
step-4.description: Monitor your spending and savings with our easy-to-use dashboard.

dashboard.title: Draft
dashboard.expenses-chart-overview-description: Overview of your expenses for each budget over time.
dashboard.description: Creating a budget helps you take control of your finances by organizing your income and expenses, ensuring your money is spent on what truly matters. Tracking your budgets allows you to stay on course, identify areas to cut back, and make informed financial decisions, leading to better savings and peace of mind.

metadata.title: Simple, free budgeting app | Qarjy
metadata.description: The simplest way to manage your finances. Say goodbye to boring and overpriced budgeting tools. Take control of your money with Qarjy - the free budgeting app that's easy and free to use.

openGraph.title: Qarjy - manage your finances easily
openGraph.description: Take control of your financial future with our easy-to-use, absolutely free budgeting app. Track your income, expenses, and savings all in one place.

twitter.title: Qarjy - manage your finances easily, for free
twitter.description: A simple way to plan your budget and manage your money effectively and for free. Try our budgeting app today!
twitter.creator: @anuarnyi

dashboard-section.title: Get started with your dashboard.
dashboard-section.subtitle: It's
dashboard-section.description: Effortlessly stay on top of your finances with an intuitive monthly overview.
dashboard-section.description-2: Automatically track and manage your budget each month. View your monthly income, expenses, and savings all in one place.
dashboard-section.description-3: Clear and concise visual representations help you make informed decisions.
dashboard-section.description-4: Visualize your essential and non-essential expenses with easy-to-read charts. Gain insights into where your money is going and identify areas to cut back.
dashboard-section.description-5: Achieve your financial dreams faster with personalized goal tracking.
dashboard-section.description-6: Set financial goals, like saving a specific amount in 6 months, and track your progress. Stay motivated and see how close you are to reaching your targets.

cta-section.title: Start now.
cta-section.description: Take control of your finances today! Start planning your budget easily and effectively with our simple tool.

trusted-by-text: 500+ users improved their finances with qarjy.
create-budget-description: Select a budget type to create a new budget
50-30-20-description: Simple budgeting method that helps you manage your money by allocating 50% to needs, 30% to wants, and 20% to savings—great for balanced financial planning
75-10-15-description: Prioritizes disciplined saving, directing 75% to expenses, 10% to savings, and 15% to investments—perfect if you want to grow your wealth while covering essentials
pricing-page-title: Take control of your finances with ease.
pricing-page-description: Start budgeting smarter without the hassle. Choose the free plan to get going, or unlock powerful features with our pro plan — designed to keep your finances simple and stress‑free.
pricing-card-basic-description: Create and track unlimited budgets, view history, estimate savings.
